===Henderson Affair===
  â
In her memoir "Life is Not a Stage," actress [[Florence Henderson]] claims a one night stand with her longtime married friend John Lindsay, resulted in a case of the crabs.
  â   â
Henderson recounts that she was cheating on her husband during the 1960s and gave in when Lindsay put the moves on her over drinks at the Beverly Hills Hotel. "I was lonely. I knew it wasn't the right thing to do. So, what did I do? I did it."
  â   â
Henderson went home later that night, and awoke to a grisly surprise the next day as she saw "little black things" crawling over her bed and body. An urgent call to a doctor took care of the problem, known medically as pubic lice, and Lindsay sent her flowers and a note of apology.
  â   â
"Guess I learned the hard way that crabs do not discriminate but cross over all socioeconomic strata," Henderson writes. "He must have had quite the active life. What a way to put the kibosh on a relationship." <ref>{{cite web|title=Brady Bunch mom got crabs in affair with NY mayor|url=http://www.reuters.com/article/2011/06/25/people-henderson-idUSN1E75N1XG20110625|publisher=Rueters}}</ref>
